ellipse
=======

**Name**:

geom ellipse

**Description**:

Create an ellipse of circle around the input geometry.

**Arguments**:

   * -w --width: The width

   * -h --height: The height

   * -p --numberOfPoints: The number of points

   * -r --rotation: The rotation

   * -c --center: The flag to use center (true) or the base (false)

   * -g --geometry: The input geometry

   * --help : Print help message



**Example**:::

    >>>geom ellipse -g "POINT (100 100)" -p 30 -w 500 -h 500

    POLYGON ((600 350, 594.5369001834514 401.97792270443983, 578.3863644106502 451.68416076895005, 552.2542485937369 496.9463130731183, 517.2826515897145 535.7862063693485, 475 566.5063509461097, 427.25424859373686 587.7641290737884, 376.1321158169134 598.6304738420683, 323.8678841830867 598.6304738420683, 272.74575140626314 587.7641290737884, 225.00000000000006 566.5063509461097, 182.71734841028552 535.7862063693486, 147.74575140626317 496.9463130731183, 121.6136355893498 451.6841607689501, 105.4630998165486 401.97792270443995, 100 350.00000000000006, 105.46309981654858 298.0220772955602, 121.61363558934974 248.31583923105006, 147.74575140626314 203.05368692688174, 182.71734841028538 164.21379363065148, 224.9999999999999 133.49364905389038, 272.74575140626314 112.23587092621162, 323.86788418308646 101.36952615793169, 376.13211581691326 101.36952615793166, 427.2542485937368 112.23587092621159, 474.99999999999983 133.49364905389024, 517.2826515897144 164.21379363065137, 552.2542485937369 203.05368692688165, 578.3863644106501 248.31583923104978, 594.5369001834514 298.02207729556005, 600 350))
